item.title: 美国寻求在七月前就卢旺达-刚果冲突达成和平协议

item.title: 首席执行官称 GameStop 的未来在于交易卡
item.description: 美国最大的独立视频游戏零售商 GameStop Corp. 首席执行官 Ryan Cohen 周四在公司年度股东大会上表示，公司将重点发展交易卡业务。【原文：GameStop Corp., the largest standalone video-game retailer in the US, will focus on growing its trading card business, Chief Executive Officer Ryan Cohen said at the company’s annual shareholder meeting Thursday.】

item.title: 英国科技部长表示，养老金干预将释放资本
item.description: 技术大臣彼得-凯尔（Peter Kyle）说，伦敦证券交易所资本不足，英国政府计划干预养老基金，迫使它们投资私营公司，这将增加注入经济的资金量。【原文：The London Stock Exchange is under-capitalized and the UK government’s plan to intervene in pension funds — forcing them to invest in private companies — will boost the amount of money being pumped into the economy, Technology Secretary Peter Kyle said.】

item.title: 特朗普的第 899 款 "报复性 "税收为何令投资者担忧？
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面国内政策立法中，有一项措施旨在惩罚那些实行政府认为不公平的税收政策的国家，这项措施在华尔街引起了轩然大波。【原文：A measure in President Donald Trump’s sweeping domestic policy legislation designed to penalize countries with tax policies the administration considers unfair is causing a stir on Wall Street.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行称欧洲养老基金可能推动美元抛售狂潮
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）的策略师认为，欧洲养老基金已开始增加货币对冲，如果这一趋势持续下去，将导致大量美元抛售。【原文：European pension funds have started to increase currency hedging and a continuation of this trend would amount to considerable US dollar selling, according to BNP Paribas SA strategists.】

item.title: 企业内部人士利用反弹以美国大选以来最快速度抛售股票
item.description: 美国股市重回正轨，距离二月份的历史高点近在咫尺。然而，企业高管却以 11 月以来最快的速度抛售股票。【原文：The US stock market is back on track and within spitting distance of February’s all-time highs. Yet corporate executives are dumping shares at the fastest clip since November.】

item.title: 英国冻结 342 处与孟加拉国前部长有关的房产
item.description: 英国警方冻结了与孟加拉国前土地部长家族有关的价值约 1.85 亿英镑（约合 2.52 亿美元）的 342 处房产，继续打击前政府成员持有的资产。【原文：British police have frozen 342 properties worth around £185 million ($252 million) linked to the family of Bangladesh’s ex-land minister, pursuing a crackdown on assets held by members of the former government.】

item.title: 陷入困境的私募股权投资获得直接贷款人的帮助
item.description: 在私募股权公司努力出售其拥有的公司并向投资者返还现金的同时，私人信贷领域的同行们也在提供特殊贷款，帮助他们渡过难关。【原文：As private equity firms struggle to sell the companies they own and return cash to investors, their counterparts in the world of private credit are offering special loans to tide them over.】

item.title: 卡尼认为美加贸易谈判取得进展
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，他希望尽快与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）达成一项商业和安全协议，但他压低了协议将在几天后的七国集团峰会前准备就绪的期望。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said he hopes to secure a commercial and security agreement soon with US President Donald Trump, though he tamped down expectations that a deal will be ready in time for the Group of Seven summit in a few days.】

item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，印度和美国的贸易官员在一些关键问题上的立场更加强硬，因为他们要争取在美国更高的关税于7月生效之前达成一项临时协议。【原文：Trade officials from India and the US have hardened their stance on some key issues as they race to conclude an interim deal before higher US tariffs take effect in July, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普重提单边关税威胁后，S&P 500 指数暴跌

item.title: Cathie Wood 称特朗普时代正在重振企业的风险胃口
item.description: ARK 投资管理公司（ARK Investment Management）创始人凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）表示，随着人们对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推动放松管制和减税的预期升温，美国企业正在重新找回风险偏好。【原文：Corporate America is regaining its appetite for risk as expectations build around Donald Trump’s push for deregulation and tax cuts, according to ARK Investment Management founder Cathie Wood.】

item.title: 交易员重新全面定价美联储今年两次降息
item.description: 由于美国生产者价格和申请失业救济人数报告支撑了债券市场的反弹，交易商再次将美联储今年将降息两次的预期完全计入价格。【原文：Traders are once again fully pricing in expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates twice this year as reports on US producer prices and jobless claims support a rally in the bond market.】

item.title: 政治动荡有望结束，厄瓜多尔债券回报率达 41
item.description: 在最近再次当选的总统丹尼尔-诺沃亚（Daniel Noboa）的领导下，厄瓜多尔终于摆脱了多年的政治混乱和经济停滞，这种乐观情绪使其债券创下了三年来的新高，尽管该国仍然深陷暴力泥潭。【原文：Optimism that Ecuador is finally exiting years of political chaos and economic stagnation under the recently re-elected President Daniel Noboa sent its bonds to a three-year high, even as the country remains mired in violence.】

item.title: 华尔街吸引了更多人参与风险更高的企业贷款
item.description: 由于包括私人信贷对手和传统投资者在内的更多贷款人的需求，华尔街银行又开始出售风险较高的企业债务--第二租赁贷款。【原文：Wall Street banks are back to selling second-lien loans, a riskier kind of corporate debt, thanks to demand from a wider swathe of lenders including their private credit rivals and conventional investors.】

item.title: Arm 首席执行官站在英伟达一边，反对美国对华出口限制
item.description: Arm Holdings Plc 首席执行官雷内-哈斯（Rene Haas）周四表示，美国对中国的出口管制有可能导致整体技术进步放缓，最终对消费者和企业不利。首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）和其他一些希望缓和华盛顿与中国政府之间紧张关系的人士的观点一致。【原文：Arm Holdings Plc Chief Executive Officer Rene Haas said Thursday that US export controls on China threaten to slow overall technological advances and are ultimately bad for consumers and companies, aligning himself with Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang and others looking to ease tensions between Washington and Beijing.】

item.title: 美国重复申请失业救济人数跃升至 2021 年底以来最高点
